product_name: The North Face Base Camp Ski Sleeve
long_description: The North Face Base Camp Ski sleeve offers up expedition-worthy toughness and go-anywhere lightness for your skis and poles. Tough, thermoplastic elastomer laminate and nylon fabric protect your skis from taxi-cab transport, luggage handlers and the tribulations of destination skiing. Interior is lined for added durability and protection. Large exterior pocket offers easy access to items when traveling; external pocket is also accessible from interior. The North Face Base Camp Ski sleeve features an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap with a mesh pad.
short_description: The North Face Base Camp Ski sleeve offers up expedition-worthy toughness and go-anywhere lightness for your skis and poles.
